# Abdullah Saeed - AI Engineer & Full-Stack Developer

## Who am I?
I am an AI Research Engineer and Full-Stack Developer specializing in building scalable Next.js applications and integrating cutting-edge Machine Learning systems. I hold an MS in Computer Science from Georgia Tech and actively contribute to IEEE research.

- **Role:** AI Engineer, Full-Stack Developer
- **Education:** MS Computer Science, Georgia Institute of Technology
- **Location:** Open to Remote & Global opportunities
- **Website:** https://abdullahsaeed.me

## Core Skills
- **Frontend:** React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- **Backend:** Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Supabase
- **AI/ML:** PyTorch, TensorFlow, LLMs (GPT, Claude, Llama), Computer Vision, NLP
- **DevOps:** Docker, AWS, Vercel, CI/CD

## Featured Projects

### Dubbby
**Domain:** AI Video Localization
**Description:** An AI-powered tool that breaks language barriers in video content. It uses a custom AI pipeline for voice synthesis and lip synchronization to dub videos into 15+ languages.
**Key Tech:** React, WebGL, Python (AI Pipeline).
**Impact:** 215% increase in global reach for users; 30-second processing time.

### Care4Brain
**Domain:** HealthTech / AI
**Description:** A progressive web app designed to detect specific early signs of cognitive decline. It integrates machine learning models to analyze cognitive test results, aiding healthcare providers in early intervention.
**Key Tech:** React, TypeScript, Machine Learning.
**Impact:** 87% accuracy in early detection; 43% reduction in assessment time.

### Blog Squirrel
**Domain:** SaaS / Content Marketing
**Description:** An automated content creation platform that helps creators maintain consistent publishing schedules. Features rich editing capabilities and built-in SEO optimization tools.
**Key Tech:** Next.js, SEO Tools.
**Impact:** 40% increase in workflow efficiency; 27-point improvement in average SEO scores.

### Simply Mortgage
**Domain:** FinTech
**Description:** A comprehensive mortgage comparison tool tailored for the UAE market. It simplifies the decision-making process for homebuyers with interactive calculators and transparent data.
**Key Tech:** Next.js 15, Server Components.
**Impact:** 98/100 Lighthouse score; 35% increase in consultation request conversions.
